text: Franca Overtoom (born 26 December 1991) is a Dutch football match official from Obdam. In November 2021 she became the first female assistant referee ever in the Eredivisie. She was chosen te become an assistant referee at UEFA Women's Euro 2022. Overtoom started to be a match official at the age of 10. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch football referees Category:Sportspeople from North Holland Category:Sportswomen
title: Franca Overtoom
